name: Red and Blue ~ Cycles of Existence (Donation)
detailed_description:
Buy this DLC to support the developer, while giving to charity.

As a thank, you will receive 3 “thank you” images. They are located in “Thank you (Donation DLC)” folder.

100% of the DLC's profits goes to the following organizations (in rotation):
Opération Enfant Soleil
Unicef
Association Nord-Côtière de l'autisme et des TED – ANCATED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
